nodes.text: Tatoo-rats were a type of brown-furred rat from the desert planet Tatooine. In 4 ABY, three tatoo-rats were climbing on the bars of a cell in the crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure's palace on Tatooine as the droids C-3PO and R2-D2 were marched past the cell in order to reach the droid pool for work assignment.

Tatoo-rats first appeared in the 1983 original trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. They were first identified in the video "Every Creature in the Star Wars Movies", which was released by the Star Wars Kids Youtube channel in 2019.
